No, the other kind of logs.

3rd lesson
Insolent decided to show up late, so I couldn't use Exclusion
1. language Assistant / Teach Harder / Call to Order
(Noisy asked a question. which was ignored)
2. Wisdom Curveball / Pop Quiz / Call to Order
(Insolent arrived late. "I saved a kitten from the middle of the motorway." That won't make you late)
(Incontinent asked a question, which was ignored)
3. Pay Attention! / language Assistant / Wisdom Curveball
(Pain in the Neck used Mocking Laugh. -3SC)
4. Call to Order / Wisdom Curveball / Burst of Knowledge
(Rip van Winkle used Sleepy and fell Asleep)
5. language Assistant / Teach / Wisdom Curveball
(Incontinent threw something)
6. Call to Order / Teach / Pop Quiz (3 turns)
(Selfish used Tornado. -3SC)
7. Teach / Pop Quiz / Call to Order
(Insolent used Unflinching Stare. -1SC)
8. Wisdom Curveball / Pay Attention! (4 turns) / Teach
(Incontinent used Disgusting Smell. Resisted)
(Exclude Selfish)
9. Pop Quiz / language Assistant / Call to Order
(Rip van Winkle used Yawning. -1SC)
10. Call to Order / Teach Harder (8 turns) / Teach
(Insolent used Grimace. -3SC)
11. Maths Bump / Teach Harder / language Assistant
(Insolent used Unflinching Stare. -1SC)
12. Maths Bump / Call to Order / Teach (confiscate item)
(Insolent asked a question, which was ignored)
13. Pay Attention! / Wisdom Curveball / language Assistant
PERFECT CLASS! MISSION COMPLETE!

Cooldowns in this lesson:
Pop Quiz - 3 turns
Pay Attention! - 4 turns
Teach Harder - 8 turns

New mission, 1st lesson
Students: Gossip, Dreamer, Manipulator, Violent, Slow, Incontinent, Hawkeye, Rip van Winkle
(Finally got Anticheat from Manipulator)
(No Exclusion = No Perfect Class)
1. Pop Quiz / Teach / Teach Harder (CRITICAL HIT!)
(Dreamer used Bore. +2)
2. Pay Attention! / Teach / Wisdom Curveball
(Gossip used Whispering. -1SC)
3. Pop Quiz / Maths Bump / Call to Order
(Violent used Bore. +1)
4. Wisdom Curveball / Teach / Maths Bump
(Slow used Yawning. -1SC)
5. Teach Harder (3 turns) / Wisdom Curveball / Teach
(Manipulator used Shifting Chair. -4SC)
6. Teach / Wisdom Curveball / Maths Bump
(Gossip had a chat with Manipulator)
Moved Gossip away from everyone
(Gossip threw something)
7. Maths Bump / language Assistant / Pop Quiz (3 turns)
(Violent used Paper Aeroplane. -3SC)
8. language Assistant / Burst of Knowledge / Teach
(Slow used Stoopid. Incontinent became Stoopid)
9. Burst of Knowledge / Wisdom Curveball / Teach
(Manipulator used Grimace. -3SC)
10. Wisdom Curveball / Maths Bump / Pay Attention! (7 turns)
(Rip van Winkle used Bore. +1)
11. Teach / Teach Harder / Pop Quiz (3 turns)
(Hawkeye used Bore. +1)
12. Pop Quiz / Call to Order / Pay Attention!
Bell rang.

(Manipulator2 doesn’t understand, +2 health)
(Big Brain on M2)
Turn 3: Teach / Solid Explanation / Wisdom Curveball
(Incontinent1 goes to toilet)
Turn 4: Pay Attention! / Teach / Front of the class!
(Incontinent2 goes to toilet)
Turn 5: Individual work / Teach / Let’s get Serious
(Incontinent1 gets back and uses Disgusting Smell, +1 to clever and -3 SC)
Turn 6: Teach Harder / Call to Order / Teach
(Jovial doesn’t understand, -6 , -4 SC)
Turn 7: Brainwash / Teach Harder / Call to Order
(I1 uses Unflinching Stare, -1 SC)
Turn 8: Pay Attention! / Call to Order / Teach Harder
(I2 comes back, I2 uses unflinching stare, -1 SC)
Turn 9: Teach / Pop quiz / Pay Attention
(I2 uses Disgusting Smell, RESIST)
(Iron Will)
Turn 10: Front of the Class! / Solid Explanation / Teach

Perfect class! 3 turns remaining!
No object confiscated.
Mission complete! 60
No completed bonus objectives.

npfan
45424Maybe Let's Get Serious has a hidden effect or is bugged

There's no hidden effect. As I mentioned in another thread, if you have one or two students left, it is possible to go through a turn with nothing happening.

TradeFederation
WyrmieAcademic Bomb: 4
Advanced Traineeship: 4
Teach Harder: 1
Hypnotism: 4
Call to Order: 2

Please do not enter any results from a class where you used Alzheimer's. We now know for sure it messes up the cooldown timers, and a 1 cooldown for Teach Harder does not match anyone else's results that were not also affected by Alzheimer's, as we have 30+ results that say 3 is the cooldown for that.
On august 22, 2013
TradeFederation

I have replicated the 1 turn cooldown for Teach Harder twice while using Alzheimers, and gotten 3 turns with Pay Attention and 4 or 5 turns with Exercise, which are all lower than the 'normal' cooldown times.


Although we are not using Alzheimer's results in the cooldown spreadsheet, if you get a breakaway result, like a extra low cooldown for a long wait attack like pay attention or exercise, or a instant cooldown for anything besides Teach, post that result, so we can better understand what exactly Alzheimer's does to the timers.
On august 22, 2013
NERON

Don't worry I left these off the spreadsheet just in case

I'll be sure to make note of the cooldowns that were affected by Alzheimer's in the future.

On august 25, 2013
TradeFederation

The Cooldown Spreadsheet <link>


Still needs your help to collect all the cooldown times for all the attacks. Remember its number of turns Between when you used the attack, and it reappears 'naturally' as an option. Naturally defined as no budget spent for unlock attacks and no Alzheimers pet skill used in the intervening turns. (they seem to mess up the cooldowns)


We have all the base attacks for sure, except we need more verification on Wisdom Curveball. We really need some of the level up attack numbers, we only have a few of them nailed down so far.


Pay attention : 4
Teach : None !!
Teach Harder : 3
Wisdom Curveball : 3
Call to Order : 2
Pop Quiz : 3


Academic Bomb : 5
Exercise : 6
Interesting Anecdote : 3


Since cooldown is real and verifiable, you should plan on waiting if you like a particular attack, and it is not unreasonable to have 2 similar long cooldown attacks like Pay Attention (4) and Uber Concentration (5?), if you like the effect, so you can use the style of attack more often

Uploading a video is slower than writing the log...

New mission, 1st lesson
Students: Rip Van Winkle, Dishonest, Less-than-gifted, Smelly, Curious, Dreamer, Pain in the neck
1. Pay Attention! / Call to Order / Teach
(Smelly used Offensive Smells. -1SC)
2. Burst of Knowledge / Call to Order / Hypnotism
(Rip Van Winkle used Sleepy and fell Asleep)

coro

(New student: Insomniac!)

(Cruel used Slander. Rip Van Winkle and Insomniac became Angry. Resisted)

(Pain in the neck used Bore. +1)

(Clever used Unflinching Stare. -1SC)

(Insomniac used Yawning. -(1+1)SC)

(Hyperactive used Deafening Noise. Resisted)

(Insomniac1 used Yawning. Resisted)
3. Pop Quiz / Wisdom Curveball / Teach / Front of the class!
(Less-than-gifted used Demotivation, +2 and became a Demotivator. -2SC)
4. Wisdom Curveball / Teach / Call to Order / Pop Quiz
(Clown used Bore. +1)
5. Pay Attention! / Teach Harder / Pop Quiz / Teach
(Raucous used Monster elastic band. -4SC)

(Insomniac2 threw something)
7. Teach Harder / Wisdom Curveball / Individual Work / Pop Quiz
(Insomniac1 used Bore. +1)

(Clown used Good Joke. Less-than-gifted started Laughing Uncontrollably)

(Less-than-gifted used Deafening Noise. -(2-1)SC)

(Shy used Dizziness and was KO. Gossip became Distracted. -(2-1)SC)

(Gossip used Have a chat and started Chatting with Insomniac1)

(Less-than-gifted used Deafening Noise. -(2-1)SC)

Grade 4 Level 15 Mission 37.1 Lesson 101

Grade 4 Level 16 Mission 41.1 Lesson 116

[8039106]

lol 45424 its all up in here p:
if u post a log u have to type the name of the student who dmged u right?
On january 12, 2014
45424
goatlol 45424 its all up in here p:
if u post a log u have to type the name of the student who dmged u right?

It's all up to you. A student who attacks this turn is less likely to attack next turn. A student who has used their signature attack most likely won't use that attack again for the rest of the lesson.

On january 13, 2014
45424

1. You better use student type (Clown, Dreamer etc.) to reference students. Names are meaningless in this game.

2. Confiscating an item costs a turn, but you skipped it.

3. The idea of making a log came from this thread. Each skill has a cooldown so you should take this into account when you use it, knowing that you won't be able to use it for a few turns.
On january 13, 2014
[8039106]

^ ahh okay thx for the tips man

so i checked and carmen was motivated, joe was clever
edit, checked the thread makes sence now

On january 17, 2014

Grade 4 Level 17 Mission 47.1 Lesson 132
Students: Dreamer, Wizard, Gossip, Jovial, Rip Van Winkle, Selfish
1. Front of the class! / Call to Order / Wisdom Curveball / Uber Concentration / Pop Quiz
(New student: Rip Van Winkle2! The original Rip Van Winkle is renamed Rip Van Winkle1)
(Jovial used Have a chat and started Chatting with Gossip)
2. Pop Quiz / Individual Work / Pay Attention! / Wisdom Curveball / Teach Harder
(Dreamer used Bore. +1)
(Gossip was moved away and started Chatting with Wizard instead)
3. Wisdom Curveball / Individual Work / Call to Order / Teach / Pop Quiz
(Jovial used Spray of spit. -1SC)
4. Teach Harder / Teach / Academic Bomb / Wisdom Curveball / Call to Order
(Rip Van Winkle2 used Yawning. -1SC)
5. Teach Harder / Interesting Anecdote / Teach / Individual Work / Wisdom Curveball (useless CRITICAL HIT!)
(Dreamer used On another planet and gained the Head in the clouds status)
6. Teach / Front of the class! / Individual Work / Teach Harder / Academic Bomb
(Jovial used Spray of spit. -1SC)
7. Teach / Individual Work / Wisdom Curveball / Teach Harder / Call to Order (2 turns)
(Gossip used Whispering. -1SC)
8. Pay Attention! / Uber Concentration (6 turns) / Teach / Pop Quiz / Wisdom Curveball
(Wizard used Bore. +1)
9. Interesting Anecdote (3 turns) / Let's get serious / Teach Harder / Academic Bomb / Individual Work
(Jovial threw something)
10. Pay Attention! / Uber Concentration / Call to Order / Pop Quiz / Individual Work (confiscate item)
(Gossip used Deafening Noise. -3SC)
11. Teach / Pop Quiz / Let's get serious / Call to Order / Pay Attention!
PERFECT CLASS!
14 students defeated

Grade 4 Level 17 Mission 48.1 Lesson 135
Students: Violent, Manipulator, Insomniac, Rip Van Winkle, Pain in the neck, Incontinent, Hawkeye, Joker
1. Individual Work / Teach Harder / Let's get serious / Teach / Pay Attention!
(New student: Curious!)
(Manipulator used Demotivation, +2 and became a Demotivator. Resisted)
2. Uber Concentration / Academic Bomb / Pay Attention! / Front of the class! / Teach Harder
(Pain in the neck used Whispering. Resisted)
3. Teach / Interesting Anecdote / Teach Harder / Pay Attention! / Pop Quiz
(Violent used Bore. +1)
4. Pay Attention! / Teach Harder / Front of the class! / Wisdom Curveball / Call to Order
(Pain in the neck used Whispering. -1SC)
5. Teach / Interesting Anecdote / Pay Attention! / Wisdom Curveball / Teach Harder
(Hawkeye used Ball of paper. Resisted)
6. Wisdom Curveball / Teach / Teach Harder / Let's get serious (4 turns) / Pay Attention!
(Manipulator threw something)
7. Pop Quiz / Call to Order (2 turns) / Front of the class! / Teach Harder / Wisdom Curveball
(Insomniac used Bore. +1)
8. Teach / Uber Concentration (5 turns) / Pop Quiz / Call to Order / Teach Harder
(Hawkeye used Ball of paper. -1SC)
9. Interesting Anecdote (3 turns) / Wisdom Curveball / Teach Harder / Teach / Pop Quiz
(Manipulator used Knuckle Cracking. -3SC)
10. Call to Order / Wisdom Curveball / Teach / Interesting Anecdote / Teach Harder
(Curious suddenly understood something and gained Score +1)
11. Individual Work / Pop Quiz / Call to Order / Wisdom Curveball / Teach (pay 10) Pay Attention! / Front of the class! (useless CRITICAL HIT!)
(Rip Van Winkle used Sleepy and fell Asleep)
12. Teach Harder / Pop Quiz / Pay Attention! / Wisdom Curveball / Call to Order
PERFECT CLASS!
17 students defeated

(Incontinent asked to go to the bathroom, which was accepted)

(Violent used Rock from the Sorbonne. -6SC)

(Manipulator used Grimace. -3SC)

(Joker threw something)

(Insomniac used Bore. +1)

(Gossip used Whispering. -1SC)

(Violent used Tacks. Hawkeye +1. -3SC)

(Rip Van Winkle used Sleepy and fell Asleep)

(Manipulator used Shifting Chair. -4SC)
13. Pop Quiz / Wisdom Curveball / Uber Concentration / Academic Bomb / Front of the class!
(Bell rang)

Grade 4 Level 17 Mission 48.3 Lesson 137
1. Pay Attention! / Let's get serious / Teach Harder / Wisdom Curveball / Academic Bomb
(Incontinent suddenly understood something and gained Score +1)

(Violent used Monster elastic band. -4SC)

(Manipulator used Bore. +1)
4. Pop Quiz / Front of the class! / Call to Order / Uber Concentration / Teach
(Insomniac used Yawning. -1SC)
5. Teach / Academic Bomb / Individual Work / Pop Quiz / Call to Order
(Incontinent used Disgusting Smell. Hawkeye and Gossip +1. -3SC)
6. Wisdom Curveball / Pay Attention! / Front of the class! / Call to Order / Teach
(Rip Van Winkle threw something)
7. Call to Order / Pay Attention! / Pop Quiz / Teach Harder / Academic Bomb
(Insomniac used The blackboard of beyond. -6SC)
8. Teach / Wisdom Curveball / Front of the class! / Pop Quiz / Pay Attention!
(Manipulator used Grimace. -3SC)
9. Individual Work / Call to Order / Teach / Academic Bomb / Pay Attention! (Heptakill!)
(Hawkeye used Ball of paper. -1SC)
10. Front of the class! / Teach / Pay Attention! / Interesting Anecdote (6 turns) / Uber Concentration (5 turns)
(Gossip used Shifting Chair. -4SC)

PERFECT CLASS!
